entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
